properties.title: Forge Related Docs - Installation and Configuration

section.name: Obtaining the plugin via maven repository
section.p: The related documents plugin is available via the hippo forge maven repository. To use the plugin, first you need to add the repository to your project's main pom.xml. You need to add the following snippet to your repositories tag.

Once you added the repository, you can add the relateddocs dependency to your project's CMS pom.xml. If your project structure is similar to the Hippo archetype project structure, you can add the following to the pom.xml found in the cms module. The version is normally managed from the parent pom but you can override it of course.
Note: on Hippo 7.8 and later, be sure to use startup option -Drepo.bootstrap=true for initializing the types, see Content Bootstrap
